analysis.description:
tppToken.indexes (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b9eac3edd2a9d08506eb7b0e8935742ef88c673.sol#110) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- indexOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b9eac3edd2a9d08506eb7b0e8935742ef88c673.sol#144-145)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/2/0x9b9eac3edd2a9d08506eb7b0e8935742ef88c673.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.23 (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b9eac3edd2a9d08506eb7b0e8935742ef88c673.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b9eac3edd2a9d08506eb7b0e8935742ef88c673.sol#85) is not in mixedCase
Parameter '_index' of tppToken.indexOf (/unique_chucks/2/0x9b9eac3edd2a9d08506eb7b0e8935742ef88c673.sol#144) is not in mixedCase
